skills.skill: HACCP (Hazard Analysis Critical Control Points) Principles

duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct routine inspections of finished goods to identify defects, inconsistencies, and deviations from quality standards.
Make real-time, accurate decisions that may affect order fulfillment and have the authority to place food on hold based on food safety or quality non-conformances.
Maintain accurate and comprehensive records of quality control tests, inspections, and outcomes.
Prepare and submit regular quality control reports to management, highlighting trends, areas of improvement, and corrective actions taken.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to address quality issues promptly and effectively.
Participate in root cause analysis and corrective action processes to prevent recurrence of quality issues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Food Science or related field (Master's preferred)
